Articles.Content:
So I noticed recently from several polls I recently took part in right here on the KSP forums with polls that have some unusual answers. I just want to find out if my hypothesis is correct!

My question for the poll is: If there is a random poll option, are people more likely to pick that option?

\*clicks on all of them

Sorry. Couldn't help it. Is that a problem?

Clickbait gets clicks.

That's my opinion.

> 
> \*clicks on all of them
> Sorry. Couldn't help it. Is that a problem?

Not a problem at all! Any result is still a result.
I myself always answer legitimately. Really, even having a random option in a poll and then everyone choosing it really distracts the main point of a thread.

I won't choose Potatoes.

I won't choose Potatoes.

I won't choose Potatoes.

***EUUUGGGHHHHHHHAAAAAAAAAHHHHH***

... I chose Potatoes.

Leave me to my shame.
I must protest. This bias for potatoes really grates on me. What about yams, or beets, or broccoli even? ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)
I try and answer legitimately or not at all!
potatoes: best served with bacon.
I clicked them all, what do i win?
I see what you did there
I voted "No" and "Potatoes", for extra irony.

> 
> I clicked them all, what do i win?

KSP police has been dispatched. Do not leave the country.

> 
> KSP police has been dispatched. Do not leave the country.

Too late i'm already headed for the moon, the police have no jurisdiction there!

> 
> Too late i'm already headed for the moon, the police have no jurisdiction there!

But what if they're...

***spaaaaace*** **police** ***?***

> 
> Too late i'm already headed for the moon, the police have no jurisdiction there!

Sooner or later, your oxygen supply will be gone. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> But what if they're...
> ***spaaaaace*** **police** ***?***

Jadoon!

(Thats for you Duodex)
i also found out fairly recently that potatoes go good with spam.

> 
> I clicked them all, what do i win?

Congratulations! You won potatoes for a year ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

OT: I think that your hypothesis is correct. Look at the poll results ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

You need one more option

[X] Tired of silly-arse polls.
